org.jboss.windup.graph

Interface GraphContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GraphContextImpl

    public interface GraphContext
extends Closeable
    Context for interacting with the underlying graph database API.
    Author:
    Lincoln Baxter, III

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear()
      Clear all data from the graph (note: the graph must be closed for this operation to succeed)
      com.tinkerpop.frames.FramedGraph<com.tinkerpop.blueprints.util.wrappers.event.EventGraph<com.thinkaurelius.titan.core.TitanGraph>> getFramed()
      Get the FramedGraph view of the underlying EventGraph.
      com.tinkerpop.blueprints.util.wrappers.event.EventGraph<com.thinkaurelius.titan.core.TitanGraph> getGraph()
      Get the underlying EventGraph, which is itself a wrapper for a TitanGraph.
      Path getGraphDirectory()
      Get the Path on disk where this graph is stored.
      GraphTypeRegistry getGraphTypeRegistry()
      Get the GraphTypeRegistry.
      Map<String,Object> getOptionMap()
      Returns the globally configured options as an immutable Map
      TypeAwareFramedGraphQuery getQuery()
      Get the GraphTypeRegistry.
      void setOptions(Map<String,Object> options)
      Sets the global configuration options to the provided Map.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.io.Closeable

        close
